design_strategy.core_philosophy: High density, zero clutter, absolute clarity. The interface is a tool, not a decoration.

grids.specs: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6 h-screen overflow-hidden

areas.sidebar: hidden md:block md:col-span-2 lg:col-span-2 h-full border-r border-slate-200 pr-4
areas.main_calendar: col-span-12 md:col-span-7 lg:col-span-8 h-full overflow-y-auto bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm
areas.upcoming_list: col-span-12 md:col-span-3 lg:col-span-2 h-full overflow-y-auto bg-slate-50 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-4

calendar.style: Custom Shadcn Calendar. NOT the default small one. Must expand to fill the container.
calendar.cell_content: Show equipment name in small text (text-[10px]) inside the date cell. Color code by status.
calendar.interaction: Clicking a date opens a Dialog with details.

tables.style: Dense mode. py-2 px-3 for cells.
tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold text-slate-500

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for dialogs. Avoid large diffuse shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid slate-200 everywhere. No borderless floating elements.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.

equipment_hero.usage: Empty states, login screen (if added later), or subtle dashboard header background

abstract_bg.usage: Subtle texture for sidebar or empty areas

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: All UI text MUST be in Spanish.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and numbers (dates, serial numbers).
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text and labels.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid layout. Do not make it a long scrolling page. It should feel like an app.
The Calendar is the heart of the app. It must be large and functional.
Data density is key. Do not use generous padding inside data tables. Keep it compact.
For the 'Authorized' toggle, use a clear Switch or Checkbox with immediate visual feedback (row turns green).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
